item.title: First reading, referred to Labor & Commerce (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).

item.title: 👍Craig Loring - Customer
item.description: Craig Loring signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Customer.

item.title: 👎💵Lindsey Hueer - Association of Washington Business
item.description: Lindsey Hueer signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Business. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Patrick Connor - NFIB
item.description: Patrick Connor signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent NFIB. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Dana Neuts signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Covington Chamber of Commerce.

item.title: 👎Brandon Cook - Covington Chamber of Commerce
item.description: Brandon Cook signed up to testify Con.
